resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105194</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105194</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209764</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Thumbnail Storyboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thumbnail Storyboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ongle du pouce Storyboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Thumbnail Storyboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Thumbnail Storyboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νύχι του αντίχειρα Storyboard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Thumbnail Storyboard</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">We need to draw storyboards for this movie. Storyboards are very important. First, you should sketch out very simple storyboards called "Thumbnail Storyboards". In the next lesson, you will create 3D storyboards using the free demo version of FrameForge Studio 3D. Later, we will turn your storyboards into a test movie called an "animatic". </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wir müssen storyboards für diesen Film zeichnen.
Storyboards sind sehr wichtig. Zuerst sollten Sie aus den 
sehr einfachen storyboards skizzieren, die "Thumbnail Storyboards" 
genannt werden. In der folgenden Lektion erstellen Sie 
storyboards 3D mit der freien Demoversion des FrameForge Studios 3D. 
Später machen wir Ihre storyboards zu einen Testfilm, der ein 
"animatic" genannt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nous devons dessiner des storyboards pour ce film.
Storyboards sont très important. D'abord, vous devriez 
esquisser hors des storyboards très simples appelés l'"Ongle du pouce 
Storyboards". Dans la prochaine leçon, vous créerez les 
storyboards 3D en utilisant la version libre de démo du studio 
3D de FrameForge. Plus tard, nous transformerons vos storyboards
en film d'essai appelé un "animatic".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nós necessitamos desenhar storyboards para este 
filme. Storyboards é muito importante. Primeiramente, 
você deve esboçar para fora dos storyboards muito simples chamados 
"Thumbnail Storyboards". Na lição seguinte, você criará os 
storyboards 3D usando a versão livre do programa demostrativo do 
estúdio 3D de FrameForge. Mais tarde, nós giraremos seus 
storyboards em um filme do teste chamado um "animatic".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dobbiamo dissipare gli storyboards per questo 
film. Storyboards è molto importante. In primo 
luogo, dovreste abbozzare verso l'esterno gli storyboards molto 
semplici chiamati "Thumbnail Storyboards". Nella lezione 
seguente, creerete gli storyboards 3D usando la versione libera del 
demo dell'studio 3D di FrameForge. Più successivamente, 
trasformeremo nei vostri storyboards un film della prova 
chiamato "un animatic".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρέπει να σύρουμε τα storyboards για αυτόν τον 
κινηματογράφο. Το Storyboards είναι πολύ σημαντικό. 
Κατ' αρχάς, πρέπει να σκιαγραφήσετε έξω τα πολύ απλά 
storyboards αποκαλούμενα "νύχι του αντίχειρα Storyboards". 
Στο επόμενο μάθημα, θα δημιουργήσετε τα τρισδιάστατα 
storyboards χρησιμοποιώντας την ελεύθερη έκδοση επίδειξης του 
στούντιο FrameForge τρισδιάστατη. Αργότερα, θα 
μετατρέψουμε τα storyboards σας σε κινηματογράφο δοκιμής 
αποκαλούμενο "animatic".</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Necesitamos trazar los storyboards para esta 
película. Storyboards es muy importante. Primero, usted 
debe bosquejar fuera de los storyboards muy simples llamados 
"Thumbnail Storyboards". En la lección siguiente, usted creará
los storyboards 3D usando la versión libre de la versión parcial de 
programa del estudio 3D de FrameForge. Más adelante, daremos 
vuelta a sus storyboards en una película de la prueba llamada un 
"animatic".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209764</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">GNU Free Documentation License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105194</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/thumbnail-storyboard</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
